listing.listing_description:
Sitting above Elia Beach, White Star is a brand new private property with a stunning view over the bay that stretches over the turquoise waters of the Aegean Sea. This panoramic location is within a short drive from Elia town as well as the village of Ano Mera. Inhale the sweet fragrance of geraniums mingled with bougainvillea as you coast your way through the sheer white abodes framed in this paradise called Mykonos.

A love for the outdoors becomes immediately evident as guests step onto the main terrace of this vacation rental. A private swimming pool with an infinity-edge seems to hover over the sea. You will find a stylish wooden deck on one side of the pool and a well-maintained lawn on the other. A large pergola covers the entertainment and relaxation areas, all equipped with stylish furnishing and the latest technology. Little could compare to the fragrance of your favorite cuts sizzling on the barbeque while you enjoy the fresh sea air. Pull up to the lovely alfresco dining area with a stunning ocean view and feast at your leisure. Wi-Fi and housekeeping are included with your reservation.

The internal spaces of White Star represent an architectural dreamscape. Each room features designer furniture and a vibrant mix of white surfaces and colorful accents. The attention to detail showcases a passion for fine seaside living. The villa includes a pull-down movie screen with projector, especially useful for a movie night during the occasional rain shower. High vaulted ceilings and white archways are reminiscent of a more romantic era.

Six exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to eleven guests at this non-smoking villa. The main house includes four bedrooms. Two separate guest studios, perfect for couples on honeymoon, are located on a lower level. All of the suites include en-suite bathrooms, television and air conditioning. The master suite also has a jetted tub.

White Star makes a great bet for guests who cherish great taste while being close to the beach. The picturesque views mixed with Cycladic aesthetics provide guests of Okyroe with an inspiring respite for mind, body and soul. The picturesque environs make it perfect for a family holiday, a group of friends or exclusive weddings, birthdays and other special events. Enter an enchanting land where luxury and tradition comingle for an idyllic getaway experience!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With entrancing views of the southern coast, this Mykonos villa offers sunlit calm and subtle glamor. A naturally-inspired infinity pool upends expectations, with stone-dashed exteriors, broad terrace and classic Greek touches adding real character to the home. Boasting rugged scenery, crisply-designed interior and 10 ensuite bedrooms; sandy beaches and Mykonos’s famed nightlife are close by.

From the air-conditioned living room and stylish sofas of Carmen, guests can recline and plan a relaxing day on this sunny Mediterranean island. Take breakfast under the nautical-theme sun shape of the open terrace, sipping on fresh juice as the sea breeze flows under the shade and through the exterior seating. The soft lighting and modern appliances of the kitchen ensure that whipping up a quick meal with local island ingredients is an easy task, while the uncluttered, deeply comfortable bedrooms feature pleasant ensuite bathrooms - ensuring the heat of the day can be washed away in refreshing privacy. 

Guests will appreciate easy access to some of the island’s beaches from Carmen, with the likes of Elia Beach being just a short drive away. Peaceful strolls along nearby mountain trails will pass by quiet hilltop churches, while local restaurants offer unique Mykonos meze dishes, which are ideal with a chilled beer or a glass of ouzo. The happening bars and clubs of the main town are closer than you think, offering great partying all night along as well as late-night dining and live music.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Alisahnea is a stunning oceanfront property located just steps away from the secluded sandy beach of Kapari in Greece. Just minutes from Agios Ioannis Beach and Mykonos, come escape to an idyllic area of the Mediterranean where boats jet along the stunning azure waters as you are fanned by the gentle sea breeze. Enter an enchanting land where luxury and tradition comingle for a perfect getaway experience!

An impressive L-shaped, saltwater, infinity swimming pool stretches around the large terrace area that has been built on two levels and offers wide sun bathing and recreational space. The pergola offers a large alfresco dining area with a wood fire barbeque and a direct entrance to the kitchen. Inside, you will find satellite television, a DVD player and Wi-Fi. Your reservation at this private holiday home includes daily housekeeping.

This vacation rental’s grand living room opens directly onto the formal dining area while also leading to the pergola. The open kitchen is fully equipped and well positioned for either indoor or outdoor entertaining. The cozy yet elegant decor of the house features white and wooden classic furniture, which blends harmoniously with the Cycladic architecture. The predominantly white furnishings and walls give the space an almost otherworldly character.

Six lovely bedrooms accommodate up to twelve guests at this non-smoking villa. Three bedrooms provide direct access to the terrace with ocean views, and the studio suite offers a separate garden entrance. Five bedrooms provide en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Sleep soundly amid the quiet ocean surroundings and wake up to the vivid colors each new day!

The picturesque views mixed with Cycladic aesthetics and fine amenities provide guests of Alisahnea with an inspiring respite for mind, body and soul. This villa makes a great bet for guests who appreciate great taste while being close to the beach. The site is perfect for a family or a group of friends. The sheer beauty and picturesque environs also make Alisahnea a favorite spot for exclusive weddings, birthdays and other special events. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Be a part of Dubai’s famous city-skyline at this contemporary penthouse in the Cayan Tower. Marvel at bird’s eye views capturing some of modern architecture’s most incredible buildings, including the Palm Jumeirah and Dubai Marina. Once you’ve got a lay of the land, walk over to the beach, stroll along the canals to the yacht club, or head to the marina district for dinner at Pier 7.

Start your morning looking out over the marina from the master ensuite’s spa-like soaking tub. Enjoy your morning Nespresso at the kitchen’s breakfast bar, or have it out on the balcony, letting the city-view inspire plans for the rest of the day. Back inside, designer furniture, lavish fixtures, and high-end electronics decorate the penthouse’s spacious layout.

Celebrating something special? Bring in a private chef and enjoy a meal in the formal dining area. After, mix a few cocktails to sip while you show off the view from the lounge. If you’re traveling with kids, they’ll love having easy access to the private plunge pool. And, if you’re keeping up with any fitness routines, the building’s shared pools, gym, and sauna are ready when you are.

For an exciting afternoon with the family, head to Wild Wadi Waterpark or Aquaventure. If you’re in the mood to shop, Dubai Mall is the largest retail-entertainment location on the planet. Looking for adventure? Try indoor skiing at Ski Dubai, located within the Mall of Emirates, or charter a fishing boat at the Yacht Club. And, no trip to Dubai is complete without spending an afternoon on JBR Beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located in one of the most sought-after area on the island, this architectural gem offers the highest standards of luxury. You’ll be greeted with a cozy, welcoming atmosphere upon setting foot inside. Taking design cues from glossy magazines, the modern interior features arched doorways, exposed stone walls, and a neutral colour scheme. Psarou Beach and Mykonos Town are mere minutes away.

Painted timber ceilings seamlessly blend with the sugar-white walls. Sky-high windows look out over panoramic vistas, drenching the living space in a kaleidoscope of natural light. A circular window with a plump cushioned ledge shows off sweeping sea views all the way to the islands of Paros and Naxos. Bask in the balmy heat of the Mediterranean sun or the bubbling warmth of the hot tub. Choose between cooling down in the Aegean breeze or plunging into the turquoise infinity pool. When golden hour reaches the multi-level terrace, pop open a bottle of champagne and soak up one of the most dramatic sunsets you’ll ever experience. The large alfresco dining table is set in the shade of the wooden pergola. 

A day trip is ideal for exploring all that this cosmopolitan area has to offer—from bar crawls to boutiques and fresh gastronomy. Stroll along the picturesque streets in the town center or feel the sand between your toes at one of Greece’s renowned beaches. Your camera roll is guaranteed to be filled with photos from sailing excursions, hiking adventures, and guided tours through archaeological sites and historic churches.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stardust is a recently built private property in the area of Fanari area – in the northwestern part of Mykonos. Its privileged hill top position provides splendid sea and sunset views.

The comfortable outdoor areas, which are perfectly equipped for guests relaxation through intriguing solutions either on the pool terrace and other smaller spaces on different levels of the house, are all appointed with charming sun beds and cushions.

The property is developed on three levels, all bearing the same contemporary pseudo-minimal taste with a dominance of white and blue tones giving a refined yet smart ambiance throughout. All bedrooms share the same standard of amenities and style granting an optimal level of comfort to all guests.

Within the vicinity of Stardust we are also proud to offer its sister villas, Moon Shadow and Crystal Sea, providing a great option for larger groups who wish to be close yet retain a good level of privacy in nearly identical properties

listing.listing_description:
This beachfront villa is situated on the Palm Jumeirah of Dubai, at the end of a private gated road, with beautiful views of Dubai Marina. Ample outdoor living areas include a swimming pool and alfresco dining, while the superb interiors feature beautiful living and dining areas, a gourmet kitchen, and a home office. Six exquisite bedrooms suites with king or queen beds and ensuite bathrooms accommodate twelve guests, forming an ideal haven for family vacations or corporate retreats.

The estate offers a rare degree of serenity amid the splendors of Dubai, with a wide stretch of private beach frontage and generous space for outdoor enjoyments. Dip into the refreshing pool and bask in the brilliant sun. Sip cool refreshments in the shade of parasols or in the lovely waterfront cabana, relaxing on the bed swing in the gentle breeze. Dine alfresco at sunset, and linger on the veranda during the glittering night.

The interiors are luminous and spacious, ideal for festive occasions or placid relaxation. The living room features cozy and ample sectionals facing a large, flat-screen TV, while the stylish dining table seats twelve. Both of these rooms open through sliding glass doors to the veranda and yard, creating an expansive, indoor/outdoor space. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a breakfast bar, and there is a light-filled breakfast room as well.

Upstairs, the office space offers an inspiring setting for study or work. There is also a separate media room with large sofas and a high-end TV. Throughout the villa, soothing wall tones and curtains complement the natural wood accents, beautiful artwork, and vintage ‘70s-era furnishings. Air conditioning ensures comfort at all times.

The bedrooms provide spacious private havens for downtime and rest—a comfortable choice for multiple couples or destination wedding guests. There are five rooms with queen beds and two with kings. Five of the ensuite bathrooms have tubs. The fifth bedroom enjoys sea views, a private balcony, and a lounge.

From this secluded abode on Frond D of the Palm Jumeirah, you're within easy reach of several famed hotels and nightlife spots on the island, including the Atlantis, as well as the family-friendly Aquaventure Waterpark. Dubai Marina is less than ten kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
White reflects the sun’s heat on this villa on the edge of Ornos Bay with its rustic stone and whitewash both inside and out. Warm breezes also help to cool while lounging on the terrace of the infinity pool and watching the ocean beneath your feet. A dip in the pool visually plays with you to make it seem like swimming in the bay.

Inside is an elegant study in white too. Beamed ceilings, arches, and windows look out to the bay from almost every room. Shady and cool with overstuffed couches and sitting areas, it’s a brief getaway from the sun. Horatia outcrops and overhangs Ornos Bay, offering birdseye views 24/7. Yoga at sunrise on this terrace seems just that more special. Evening cocktails and late suppers with the sound of the sea and the beauty of the villa’s soft lights is impressive.

Horatia is pet-friendly and digitally connected. The Concierge here is a miracle worker getting the best reservations to most restaurants with little waiting, even Scorpios. It’s 4 km to charming Mykonos Town for shopping therapy or clubbing. Psarou Beach is a few minutes away with its powdery beach and is a big draw for water sports.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Just meters from one of the most tranquil and picturesque beaches of Paros, Santa Maria Beach House offers a rare beachfront experience in Greece. This lovely 4-bedroom island beach house is cushioned by a lush private garden and enjoys tranquil views of the sea and surrounding neighborhood. A romantic private stone path, shielded by a bamboo grove, meanders down to the sandy beach where you can sunbathe, swim or snorkel to your heart’s content, just two minutes’ walk from the house.

Authentically Greek chalky white walls are offset by the cornflower blue of the sea and sky. Outdoor living is abundant during the summer months and there are plenty of places to soak up the gorgeous views, meditate or strike your yoga poses on the terrace. An al fresco dining area, shaded by a pergola, is perfect for laid-back lunches and romantic starlit dinners.

Step inside and you’ll immediately be impressed by how quickly the simple, uncluttered living spaces can clear your mind. Perhaps it’s the scent of the lemon groves or the ozone-laden sea breezes that make you feel clean and wholesome here. The living room is a pleasant spot for indulging in a good book while the sun is at its peak, or gathering with friends or family to watch DVDs on the satellite television. There’s also Wi-Fi throughout if you need to stay connected. An open-plan kitchen and informal dining area are designed for preparing and enjoying family meals, or you may decide to take breakfast on the terrace.

All that fresh sea air is bound to make you sleepy, so you’ll be glad to retire to the comfort of your fan-cooled bedroom. All four are simply styled for rest and relaxation, with traditional shuttered windows to block out the bright Greek sun when you need to sleep. En-suite facilities add a touch of luxury and the upstairs master bedroom has access to a rooftop terrace – where better to start the day with a freshly brewed morning coffee as you survey the Mediterranean garden and sea beyond? The other three bedrooms are equally comfortable and enjoy lovely views from the lower level.

The charming island of Paros is easy to get around in a rental vehicle and there is plenty to see and do on your doorstep. It’s a 2 minute walk to Santa Maria beach, 2 km to the shops and 8 km to the nearest town. The airport is 15 km.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Whether you need an adventure in the Greek islands or a sun-soaked week of relaxation, you can find it at Neptunea. This waterfront Mykonos vacation rental is beautifully suited to a quiet holiday with family, thanks to its stunning location and expansive outdoor living areas. If you want more excitement, it's only a short drive from hot spots like Agios Ioannis and Mykonos Town.

Savor the views of the Aegean and the neighboring island of Delos from a private terrace featuring a saltwater pool, loungers and sunbeds under umbrellas and a pergola, a wood-fired barbecue and an al-fresco dining area. After the sun sets, settle in by the television, sound system and Wi-Fi for a laid-back evening.

Inside Neptunea, white walls and beamed ceilings create a traditionally inspired yet restful ambience. Several sets of french doors flood the living areas with sunshine, and archways separating the two dining areas from the living room and fully equipped kitchen give the rooms an easy flow. A one-level layout makes this luxury home ideal for groups of all ages.

There are three bedrooms in the main house at Neptunea: one master suite with a double bed, en-suite bathroom and sea views, and two bedrooms with double beds and hall bathroom access. There is also a guest house with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, whose separate entrance means it could be used as a honeymoon-esque retreat or a quieter space for in-laws.

From the villa's waterfront setting, it's only a few minutes' drive to some of the island's best beaches, from the calm, clear waters of Kapari Beach to the soft sands of Agios Ioannis. Pick up necessities at the nearby shops or make the quick trip into Mykonos Town to explore its boutiques, galleries, museums, historic sites and, of course, its restaurants.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Kymothoe is a spacious oceanfront villa located in the Agios Ioannis area of Mykonos that combines a traditional Greek aesthetic with the finest modern amenities. The property shares a private entrance and parking area with Villa Okyroe and is situated just a few minutes by foot from the secluded sandy beach of Kapari. Experience the Aegean Sea like never before with Luxury Retreats!

The grounds at this stunning vacation rental feature a private infinity swimming pool, a garden setting and a shaded pergola. The terrace area around the saltwater pool is equipped with teak deck chairs, an outdoor lounge and large sun beds. You will also find a lovely alfresco dining set for twelve and a barbeque. Wi-Fi and housekeeping are included with your reservation.

The bright and elegant living room and oval sitting area are exquisitely furnished with an off-white upholstered day bed, armchair and flowing curtains. Both have access to the swimming pool and overlook the sea. The open plan formal dining space connects with a modern kitchen, an outdoor patio and the barbeque area. The large outdoor dining table by the swimming pool is perfect for all day sea breeze dining.

Six delectable bedrooms accommodate up to twelve guests at this non-smoking villa. Four sleeping quarters are located in the main house, and two in the guest house. Guests will have their choice of double or twin beds. The picturesque location and layout of this villa makes it a great bet for a family holiday or a special event like a wedding or birthday. The guest house provides extra privacy for a couple on honeymoon or any other member of the group who requires more space.

Kymothoe offers a peaceful environment in a glamorous, yet laid back solution for family and friends looking to get away to this delightful Mediterranean island. The picturesque views mixed with Cycladic aesthetics and fine amenities provide guests of Kymothoe with an inspiring respite for mind, body and soul. Inhale the sweet fragrance of geraniums mingled with bougainvillea as you coast your way through the sheer white abodes framed by turquoise waters in this Greek paradise called Mykonos!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Combining 3 stand-alone villas, this hillside estate on Paros is the perfect vacation spot for a couples retreat, multi-family vacation, and those who appreciate a little extra privacy. Hang out on the rooftop garden as the sun sets beyond the mountains. Sip cocktails under the shaded pergola as you watch the sailboats in the harbor. Then, charter yourself a boat and explore the isles. 

The soft and soothing tones of Cycladic architecture will take you to new levels of relaxation at Nereids Villa Estate. Wander the property and discover reading nooks in the garden, shady spots for afternoon naps, and 3 swimming pools. Each villa has a fully-equipped kitchen, so let your culinary creativity run wild. Then, dine outside amongst the fresh sea breeze and island landscape. 

Feel like barbeque? Head into town and pick up some fresh fish from a local market, maybe grab some beers too. Then spend the afternoon lounging on the terrace, working on your tan in a sun chair, and popping in and out of the pool. At night, check what for a soccer match on the Smart TV or move the party to the rooftop garden for some star gazing. 

Ready for a night on the town? Make your way to Parikia or Naoussa, the island’s most popular villages where the narrow, winding streets are lined with restaurants, bars, and night clubs. If you’d rather keep it low-key, Paros Village has a more historic-vibe and traditional Greek cuisine. In the mornings, Paros’ wind conditions are ideal for watersports; it’s the perfect time to try surfing. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Tucked into a vast estate located in the Kolimpithres area of Paros, only a few minutes away from a sandy cove with crystal waters, Senna is a beautiful mansion that offers seclusion and tranquility. This exquisite vacation rental sits peacefully amid its untouched natural surroundings that offer a sense of harmony and balance. Mindful of the traditional Cycladic design, the architect has created a playful synthesis of interconnected cubes and smartly allocated internal patios.

The main gate opens to a charming pebbled patio. Its whitewashed walls are pierced by small windows and lit by handmade lanterns. Thoughtfully integrated into the natural setting, the outdoor areas convey a bohemian-chic atmosphere. At the back of the house, the swimming pool offers a secluded hideaway that can be accessed via two master bedrooms. You will also find a lovely alfresco dining set, a wood oven and a barbeque. Interior perks include an espresso machine, satellite television and Wi-Fi. Your reservation includes housekeeping and chef services.

The living room, kitchen and guest bedroom enclose a superb central patio with large, luxury sofas and views to the meadow. The interior is bright and airy, with spacious living areas and large openings. The living room has been elegantly decorated, with signature furnishings accentuated by French country details. The palette is mostly white, complimented by wooden ceilings and floors. An adjacent formal dining area is served by a large kitchen with a central unit that would please even the most demanding chefs. Senna is perfect for a family getaway or a special celebration like a wedding.

Carefully appointed, the spacious bedrooms feature large windows and sparkling views. Wooden ceilings, floors and ornaments are made of natural materials that convey a sense of familiarity and comfort. Five bedrooms accommodate up to ten guests. The two independent guestrooms feature separate entrances and open to the central patio.

Senna in Paros offers the opportunity for that private dream holiday in the sun. The area is known for some of the most beautiful beaches in the Greek islands, characterized by crystal clear water and a relaxing ambience. Some beaches in Paros are lined up with hotels, beach bars and restaurants, while others are remote and secluded. The eastern beaches are renown for windsurfing and kite surfing. However you spend your time in Greece, be sure to have your vacation, your way!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A green jewel bordering the desert metropolis, this Dubai villa is a plush, beautifully-designed retreat. Guests will love the outdoor pool, which is ringed by shady green trees and seasonal blossoms. Tastefully outfitted in a light-and-dark Arabian theme, the villa features white pillars, slick stone and captivating decor. Close to numerous restaurants, it is just 20 minutes from downtown Dubai.

Built in a specially-constructed neighborhood, Chalet Noma provides guests with a delightful level of comfort and peacefulness. Situated on the edge of the desert plains, it provides 2 levels of serene luxury, with a triumphant hallways of stone pillars, and a magnificent chandelier. Guests can congregate in the pleasant shade of the terrace, sipping on cool drinks as trees sway in the breeze and the brilliant pool mirrors the clear sky above. Inside, the sumptuous living room and huge bedrooms ensures guests will feel like they’re receiving the royal treatment throughout their stay. The provided media room and fully-equipped entertainment system ensures that guests can thoroughly relax after a day of the country's famous heat, with the central air-conditioning keeping the climate at an ideal level throughout this impressive property.

The villa itself is located in a pleasant, wooded settlement on the edge of the city, with a number of varied restaurants, stores and cafes within a short walk of the home. Dubai’s downtown is no more than 20 minutes by car, while the city’s famous beaches and glittering shopping districts thus being easily accessible. Guests can also visit world-famous attractions such as the Dubai Zoo in approximately 20 minutes, with safaris amongst dream-like dunes being a highly popular and close-by option. This is an excellent choice for those seeking a pleasant stay complete with a touch of desert calm, while still retaining access to this renowned world city.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Experience the Greek islands’ sea, sun and white stucco at Villa Jackson on Paros. Just minutes away from the Agia Eirini beach, the property has stunning views of the sunset over the Aegean Sea. Six bedrooms spread out over two houses and two studios make this villa ideal for family events or groups of friends.

Soak in the sun from the pool overlooking the ocean or one of the chaise longues on the pool terrace. There’s an outdoor shower for post-swim rinses, a barbecue for grilling local seafood and an al-fresco dining area for dinners with sunset views. An inner courtyard is the perfect spot for a sunny breakfast or relaxed lunch. Gather around the television and DVD player in the evenings, stay connected via Wi-Fi, and flip on the ceiling fans on warmer nights.

White interiors with floor-to-ceiling windows are both a nod to traditional Greek island architecture and a contemporary statement. In open-plan living and dining room, sunlight washes over pale concrete floors and white walls, tables and light fixtures and bounces off colorful accents like a mod turquoise sectional and translucent dining chairs. One fully equipped kitchen continues the minimalist vibe with white cabinets and stainless steel appliances, while the other goes bold with pops of near-neon orange.

Villa Jackson has two houses with two bedrooms, and two studios with one bedroom each. All of the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. In each house, there’s one bedroom with a double bed and one bedroom with two twin beds. In each studio, there’s one bedroom with a double bed, and available sofa beds for additional accommodations.

From the villa, Agia Eirini beach is only a 10 minute walk away. It’s a 6 km drive to Paroikia Port, and about 6 km to either the town of Paroikia or Paros. Explore Contaratos Beach, just under 16 km away, or Santa Maria Beach, 16 km away. Paros National Airport is also about 6 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sun, sea, sky and stylish accommodation: all the essentials for a memorable Greek islands holiday are close at hand at The G House. From its gorgeous terrace to its sophisticated interiors, this well-appointed vacation rental gives you the quintessential Mykonos experience. And if you'd like to explore the island, a location outside Tourlos close to both Mykonos Town and the popular Agios Stefanos beach makes it easy.

Take in views stretching from Mykonos Town across the Aegean to Rhenia and Delos from expansive outdoor living areas with a pool, plenty of loungers, al-fresco dining and a wood-fired barbecue. After watching the sun go down over the neighboring islands, you can go out on the town or unwind in private with the help of the TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.

A lush garden and traditionally inspired architecture lend The G House ample charm. The views extend to the living and dining rooms, thanks to an open-concept layout and multiple doors to the terrace, while a nearly all-white color scheme helps the sunlight bounce around the space. The adjacent fully equipped kitchen has a breakfast bar and opens to the outdoor dining area to make al-fresco meals a snap.

The six bedrooms at this luxury property, all with en-suite bathrooms, can accommodate up to twelve friends or family members. There are four bedrooms with double beds, including two master suites with their own balconies facing the sea, and two bedrooms with queen beds.

Though its hillside setting and the views of the town below make it feel secluded, The G House is just a short drive from the sandy beach of Agios Stefanos, the bustling new harbor in Tourlos, and central Mykonos Town, where you can explore boutiques, museums and galleries, stroll the historic streets, sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner at an oceanfront spot or enjoy a lively nightlife scene.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located uphill in a unique wind-sheltered position in the Fanari area, The Eagle’s Nest villa enjoys one of the most beautiful panoramic views in all of Mykonos. This chic Greek villa overlooks the islands of Tinos, Syros and Delos in the Aegean archipelago. Magical sunsets are the pièce de résistance every night at this spectacular seaside villa!

The infinity swimming pool features an intriguing shape—a large rectangle topped with a semicircle. The vast pool offers panoramic views while the infinity-edge creates the illusion of its waters mingling with those of the Mediterranean. With a built-in spa, you will emerge relaxed and rejuvenated like never before. The outdoor setting is well appointed with antique wooden furniture, curios and artifacts. There are several terraces and pergolas where you can recline in sun or shade. A wood fire barbeque sets the tone for lovely alfresco dining. Indoors at The Eagle’s Nest, you will find satellite TV, DVD/CD players and Wi-Fi access. Housekeeping is included with your reservation.

The property is spread over several natural terraces connected by quaint stone paths. The Eagle’s Nest consists of three buildings—the main house and two separate guesthouses. The style and feel of this property combine typical Cycladic architecture with elements of Provencal country style giving this property a special charm and remarkable appeal. The main house features a beautiful open plan kitchen, while the living room is bright and cozy. One of the two guesthouses is located below the pool and main patio, while the second, with kitchenette, is located above the main villa, next to a tiny private chapel.

Eight delectable bedrooms accommodate up to fourteen guests at The Eagle’s Nest. All of the bedrooms feature air conditioning, and there are six en-suite bathrooms. Four of the bedrooms offer direct terrace access, and the suite on the upper floor includes a rooftop terrace—perfect for starry nights!

Nothing says Mykonos like sixteenth century windmills and the buildings perched on the water in Little Venice. Built on the water’s edge to accommodate the fast-paced lives of swashbuckling pirates, the Little Venice of today endures as the quintessential place for travelers to grab a bite as they watch the boats go by. The Paraportiani church and the island of Delos could also be on the itinerary during your stay at The Eagle’s Nest.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The sun, sea and natural stone make up the stunning backdrop to Aegean Oasis. Set on the rocks overlooking a quiet bay near Lia Beach, the five-bedroom villa is private and calm, away from the more well-traveled parts of Mykonos. The property has gorgeous views over the sea and unique architecture that incorporates the island’s rocks, but a location close to several other beaches makes day trips tempting, too.

Aegean Oasis opens to several levels of terraces that spread out above the sea. The centerpiece is an infinity lagoon-style pool, but there’s also a sunny area with chaise longues, a sunken gazebo with built-in seating, and a pergola-covered outdoor dining area. Inside, you’ll find satellite TV, a sound system, Wi-Fi and even a grand piano for entertainment, as well as air conditioning.

Throughout the villa, natural stone is juxtaposed with modern furnishings and contemporary art for intriguing, one-of-a-kind interiors. In the living room, cool white walls, a pared-down fireplace, stone floors and low-profile white sofas are enlivened by playful sculpture, large-scale paintings and French doors opening to the cliffs outside. Likewise, the dining room’s glass-topped table and klismos chairs provide traditional contrast for the avant-garde artwork and open-air layout. The fully equipped kitchen is fresh and minimalist, with white cabinets and stainless steel appliances, save for the textured rock wall at one end.

For privacy, the villa’s five bedrooms are spread out across its three levels. Each bedroom has an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, terrace access and sea views. The lower level and ground floor each have two bedrooms with double beds. Upstairs, on the mezzanine level, the master suite has a double bed and a bathroom built into the rock face.

Aegean Oasis is convenient to the town of Ano Mera, 4 km away, Mykonos Tennis Club, 7 km away, Mykonos Island National Airport, 10 km away, and the town of Mykonos, 12 km away. There’s also a wealth of beaches nearby for you to explore; from the villa, it’s just under 3 km to Lia Beach, about 4 km to Kalo Livadi and the Kalafati beaches, 6 km to Elia Beach, 7 km to Panormos Beach and 10 km to Super Paradise Beach. Agios Sostis, Grand and Mykonos Paradise beaches are all about 13 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The curved staircase draws your eye as much as the sweeping views atop the center of Dubai, in this residence. Clean, crisp lines, tasteful décor, and modern amenities make the space welcoming yet professional. Here for a conference? Are you meeting associates for some top-level thinking or last-minute contract negotiations? Our hospitality and attention to business service needs are impeccable.

Jumeirah Living WTC 1307 residence is a part of the World Trade Centre residences and sits atop the city in the heart of Dubai’s business district. The rooftop pool is ideal at the end of a busy day to log a few laps, then relax poolside on a lounger to catch up on a bit of paperwork or catch a short nap. There’s also access to a shared fitness center. Gracious bedrooms with city views are on the second level. A galley kitchen, office, open living, and dining area, which could also work as a small conference room, is on the lower level, again all with striking city views.

Being within walking distance to the Dubai World Trade Centre and Dubai Convention Centre there are many restaurants and shops are nearby. To visit points of interest, the Burj Khalifa is 5.7 km, and it’s 6 km to the Dubai Mall or Dubai Opera and 6.2 Km to the Dubai Fountain. Our concierge services can help you with restaurant bookings or other excursions you may be interested in.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved

listing.listing_description:
Walk along a private beach, dine in one of 5 amazing restaurants, and sip cocktails at the poolside bar, all without leaving Ceasar’s Palace Bluewaters in Dubai. You’ll get an incredible lay of the land from this dynamic city-view suite. And what a city it is. Diving with sharks, skiing on indoor slopes, and some of the World’s most pristine beachfront await. With such limitless possibilities, you’ll want to have an inspiring place to plan out your schedule. Here it is.

Ceasar’s grayscale color scheme is accented by warm wood tones and touches of gold, setting an elegant tone for any occasion. You and your crew will surely appreciate the social atmosphere created by the villa’s open concept layout. The breakfast bar is the link between the living room and the kitchen, making it easy to keep up with the conversation, even when prepping meals. And, each bedroom captures a scenic view of the city.

Daily housekeeping, a valet, and laundry service will alleviate any leftover stress during your stay, allowing you to focus on enjoying Ceasars Palace and Dubai. Keep up with your fitness routines in the state of the art gym. Cool off in the swimming pool. If you’re traveling with kids and teens, the Empire and Roam clubs have exciting programs to keep them entertained if you need some adult time.

Dubai’s marina district isn’t just the place to charter a private yacht or fishing trip. It’s also home to some of the city’s freshest seafood restaurants, buzzing bars, and vibrant nightclubs. If you feel like shopping, the Mall of the Emirates, being the largest retail/entertainment center on the planet, should satisfy your every desire. And, if there’s a golfer in the group, Emirates Golf Club is a beautiful way to experience over 100 species of local flora and fauna while you challenge yourself to a round.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set in one of the most privileged locations of southern Paros, villa Agassi is a gorgeous six bedroom summer home with striking views of the bay of Faragas and a breathtaking sunset. True to the vernacular architecture, the structure is composed of strict geometric forms, clean lines and dazzling white surfaces that create an interesting contrast with the soothing colors of the sea and sky.

The outdoor pergola-shaped dining and lounge areas are adjacent to an L-shaped infinity pool that blends in the seascape, creating the illusion of weightlessness. The interior is composed of minimal ornamentation and flat surfaces as dictated by the less-is-more philosophy of the Cycladic design. Minimal yet ultimately luxurious, the living areas feature large openings that offer stunning views of the landscape. Stark-white walls accentuate the cutting-edge Italian furniture and a few carefully selected art pieces that are casually placed throughout the house.

There is minimum usage of furniture and accessories, while great emphasis has been laid on spaciousness. The living room, kitchen and dining area are divided by high arches that add a geometric slant and optimize the illusion of openness. Orientated to offer views of the sea, the comfortable sofas and raw-wood coffee table are highlighted by the pale-colored polished stone floorings. The designer raw-wood dining table is served by a stylish kitchen that is fully equipped for home-cooking. In the same concept, the bedrooms are large and inviting, with designer furnishings and carefully selected upholstery aimed to pamper our senses and create an atmosphere of ultimate relaxation. All bedrooms lead to gorgeous verandas and offer stunning views of the settings. There are also two independent guest houses that are accordingly decorated and are ideal for couples or guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved

ul.li: Bedroom 1- Master: King size bed, En-suite bathroom

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy relaxed island living indoors and out at Nadal. This thoughtfully designed Paros vacation rental makes the most of its location just outside the town of Naousa with a sunny courtyard and bedrooms opening to a terrace. It’s an ideal retreat that makes it easy for up to sixteen friends or extended family to stay close to several classic Greek-island beaches.

The villa’s central courtyard features an infinity pool, loungers, al-fresco dining and a barbecue, all within listening distance of an outdoor sound system. You can even set up the home theater to watch a movie outside after sunset. Other amenities range from an exercise room to Wi-Fi, air conditioning and a security system.

Inside, Nadal’s expansive living areas are filled with natural light and natural textures such as wood ceiling beams and leather sofas. Concrete floors, however, add a subtly urban touch to the living room, dining room and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

There are three bedrooms in the main house of this luxury property and five in guest houses; all have double beds and en-suite bathrooms. Several of the guest-house bedrooms have their own private entrances, making them perfect for couples wanting a honeymoon-style escape, as well as features like lounge areas and kitchenettes. Like the common living areas, the bedrooms are bright and modern, with an eclectic mix of furnishings that makes them feel like the home of a stylish friend.

You could easily spend your holiday lounging by the pool, savoring the company of family and friends. But if you’d like to explore the island, it’s less than a 10-minute drive to both Kolymbithres Beach, plus shopping and dining in the town of Naousa. The cities of Paros and Lefkes are a bit farther, but still within easy reach for a day trip—or even just an evening out.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Gaze out over city views on Dubai's newest island, Bluewaters, from the legendary comfort of Ceasar's Palace. With a lengthy list of World-class amenities included, you'll have plenty to see and do without leaving the residence. Although you're in Dubai, so you may want to check out sites like Mall of the Emirates, Palm Jumeirah, and the Dubai Zoo, to name a few. There's plenty to discover within a few kilometers of Ceasars, or, you could just relax on their private beach.

Gather the group for a casual breakfast, stretching along the countertop/bar that separates the wall kitchen from the rest of the open concept living area. After, kick back on the L-shaped sofa, turn on the satellite television, and relax before beginning another exciting day. If you're thinking of hosting, Ceasar's grayscale color scheme with gold accents sets an elegant tone that will add an extra touch of sophistication to any occasion.

During your stay, the complimentary housekeeping, valet, and laundry service will ensure you have nothing to worry about except working on your tan. 5 hotel restaurants make it easy to find the perfect meal for every occasion, and when you're done with dinner, Ceasar's bars are ready for the after party. And, the Empire and Roam clubs provide interactive places for kids and teens to hang out if you need to sneak away for a bit.

Have the morning off? Challenge yourself to the course record, a 61 set by Ernie Els, at Emirates Golf Club. This scenic course is home to over 100 species of local flora and fauna set amongst fairways that wind through dynamic city and ocean views. If you're looking for family fun, let the kids run wild at Wild Wadi Waterpark as you enjoy a cocktail or two at the tiki bar.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take in a stunning infinity pool that visually blends with the blue Mediterranean beyond, as Greek islands shimmer in the distance. Experience the villa’s sumptuous white rooms, expansive deck and profusion of special extras, such a private swimming cove and wine cellar. Located on the quiet south-western corner of vibrant Mykonos, this villa is brushed by the sea that laps over the rocks below.

Surrounded by the balmy climate of the Cyclades island chain, Villa Aphrodite ensures total comfort by providing full air-conditioning throughout the spacious rooms, with the refreshing infinity pool and sea-access for those looking to dive in for a rewarding swim. Located in a private coastal location, the villa has been designed with a dose of light, maritime colors and tastefully sculpted fixtures. Guests will sink into the welcoming living area upon arrival, which is complete with a huge, wall-length comfort sofa. The welcoming bedrooms all provide excellent views, while the terrace garden adds a dash of vibrant, green color to the serene seascape that stretches beyond.

Mykonos is one of Greece’s best known destination islands, in part due to the fantastic restaurant and culinary scene, as well as the historical importance that these islands hold in the mythological pantheon. Make the short trip into the collection of striking white buildings that make up Mykonos town, savoring an evening of famously delicious seafood washed down with characterful retsina wine, or experiencing the atmosphere of the town’s renowned bar scene. Experience the rugged beauty of the island via a stimulating guided hike along the windswept north coast, or cruise out for a wonderful day-trip to the history-drenched island of Delos, reported birthplace of Apollo, where ruined temples, abandoned theatres and haunting mosaics are yours to discover.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
